alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 10:33AM PST until December 18 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MST /2 PM PST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...A mix of snow, sleet and freezing rain. Less than a tenth of an inch of ice expected. Snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Harney County, Baker County and Malheur County zones. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MST /2 PM PST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Roads and sidewalks may become ice-covered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures are forecast to slowly rise above 32 degrees by mid-afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Harney County; Malheur County
